title: @Riot @Anyone What About Taliyah?
body:
What About Taliyah State Riot?
I mean...
Taliyah feels pretty bad to play these days and she needs more buffs imho
49.5 win rate for 125+ games played (Kinda MEH) with 1,6% Play rate
OVERALL PERFORMANCE RANKING in midlane: 39/47
WORSE THAN GALIO
NOT COUNTING THE INCOMING RYLAI'S NERF!!!

Source Champion.gg

replies.body: Buffs would be nice, reverting to before 6.14 would probably be better.

Just revert her to her release
It was fine once people got good at her

But nooooo, Riot decided listening to people who had almost no experience on her (if any at all) and didn't want to learn how to actually play her was a better idea and made her braindead easy and had to neuter all her rewarding potential as a result.
sigh...
Her damage op but she has the range of anivia, she basically oneshots with e+w
They nerfed Her E damage twice, she doesn't oneshor anyone anymore
You can still "oneshot" (even though a true onshot is with one ability) an adc or squishy with the w e q combo
So can every other mid laner in the game except maybe Vladimir.

{{champion:163}}'s E is gutted in almost every aspect and it definitely needs tweaks. Her W is still disgustingly bad and Zenon is still trying to find the time to get a coder to implement the QoL change. They just need to fix these two skills and she'd be fine for the time being. Worked Ground can definitely be more interesting, but seeing how she's a new champion who came out shortly after the Mage rework, I doubt she's getting any mechanical changes soon.
Saying worse than Galio isn't really a good example, galio is kinda strong since some patches

As someone who has 100k points on her, not that it means that I want to say I'm amazing at her, but she's fine for the most part. A small buff to e or giving q the added minion damage in some form would be nice though.
I think she's fine where she is, whenever I play with her i do great.

So, as a Diamond 5 taliyah main, who has mained her since her release, i personally think she is a decent spot. While i agree that the q wave clear removal was a major nerf for taliyah, riot added a hidden nerf to her q. Her q now starts to go on cool down as soon as it starts casting versus when it finished. And due to the reduced cool down you can now permanently have q going on as long as you move around enough. They have changed her to an extremely kite able late game champion and while it has taken some getting use to i believe she is over all extremely strong right now. (yes i did copy and paste this from another post, im lazy okay? I will add however that she is more one dimentional with all her power in her q, i do miss the old taliyah where you had to e before w. Basically when she her w e combo was insanely hard to land but had a high reward. I miss the old w D:
yeah i kinda do agree shes not good anymore after that e nerf i quit playing her. Her e was where she gets most of her burst dmg and now its eh.
They had to make it so she wasn't face roll freelo off of pure numbers and hidden power.
